column1: '''''O Evangelho da Terra-Média: Leituras Teológico-literárias da Obra de J. R. R. Tolkien''''' is a Brazilian academic book that collects many articles about Tolkien and his relationship with theology and philosophy.<ref>{{webcite
column3: articlename=O Evangelho da Terra-Média: Leituras Teológico-literárias da Obra de J. R. R. Tolkien

column2: The book presents a reading of literary elements in Tolkien's works. Experienced in the use of tools of analysis and literary criticism, the authors give prominence to an important aspect of Tolkien's work, not always well perceived: their religious and theological element.}}
